transaction.wsdltype:
<xsd:complexType name="SelectIdVilleResponse">
<xsd:all>
<xsd:element name="sql_output">
<xsd:complexType>
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="row">
<xsd:complexType>
<xsd:attribute name="cty_idt" type="xsd:integer"/>
<xsd:attribute name="lnd_idt" type="xsd:integer"/>
</xsd:complexType>
</xsd:element>
</xsd:sequence>
</xsd:complexType>
</xsd:element>
</xsd:all>
</xsd:complexType>

</xsd:all>

<xsd:complexType name="databaseConnector__InsertPageResponse"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:ConvertigoError"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sql_output"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

<xsd:complexType name="databaseConnector__InsertPageSaveResponse"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:ConvertigoError"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sql_output"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

<xsd:complexType name="databaseConnector__SelectPageResponse">
<xsd:all>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:ConvertigoError"/>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sql_output">
<xsd:complexType>
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="row">
<xsd:complexType>
<xsd:attribute name="SITE" type="xsd:string"/>
<xsd:attribute name="URL" type="xsd:string"/>
<xsd:attribute name="HTML_CONTENT" type="xsd:string"/>
</xsd:complexType>
</xsd:element>
</xsd:sequence>
</xsd:complexType>
</xsd:element>
</xsd:all>
</xsd:complexType>

java.lang.String.value:
SELECT DISTINCT * 
FROM `crawlingdatabase`.`temp` AS a 
WHERE NOT EXISTS 
 (SELECT * FROM `crawlingdatabase`.`webpages` AS b 
 WHERE b.url = a.url AND b.site = '{{site}}') 
ORDER BY url;

java.lang.String.value:
UPDATE WEBPAGES 
SET html_content = '{{htmlContent}}' 
WHERE url = '{{url}}' 
 AND site = '{{site}}';

transaction.wsdltype:
<xsd:complexType name="databaseConnector__UpdatePageResponse">
<xsd:all>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:ConvertigoError"/>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sql_output"/>
</xsd:all>
</xsd:complexType>

<xsd:complexType name="Default_transactionResponse">
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:group maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:HTMLconnectorTypes"/>
</xsd:sequence>
</xsd:complexType>
<xsd:group name="HTMLconnectorTypes">
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:ConvertigoError"/>
<xsd:any maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" namespace="##any"/>
<xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" ref="tns:linksRecordType"/>
</xsd:sequence>
</xsd:group>
<xsd:complexType name="linksRecordType">
<xsd:sequence>
<xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="link" type="xsd:string"/>
</xsd:sequence>
<xsd:attribute name="referer" type="xsd:string" use="optional"/>
</xsd:complexType>
transaction.handlers: // handlers are handled by Statements for HTML Transaction.

transaction.wsdltype: <xsd:complexType name="GoUrlResponse"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="error" type="tns:ConvertigoError"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="links" type="tns:linksRecordType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="html_content" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
transaction.handlers: // handlers are handled by Statements for HTML Transaction.

java.lang.String.value: The CrawlWebSite Sequence will crawl any web site by following href links. All the web pages belonging to the original domain will be referenced in a database. \n \n
Test to see if target url is in the same domain as the orginial web page.
Test to see if the page is already in the database
Check to see if we are not handling our current url
This is the original web site url. Set here the url of the root web page
This is the original web site url. Set here the url of the root web page
Url of the entry page. This can be empty as url will be set to 'WebSite' content automatically.
Set it in an element to be used as a source
